: : Rodimus Prime : :
Rodimus Prime: Yes, home...
Rodimus starts to walk, but the damage he has sustained makes his steps unsterdy. Rodimus activates his boosters, and takes to the air, heading to the Maximal base.
 airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:Windlord:

Windlord felt a relief, heh hadn't to use the plan two "Come love" 
tought the male"We're going to home"

"Lead the way, commander... "said calmly Windlord
